title: TypographyShop is up!
content:
We've just launched [http://typographyshop.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018224524/http:/typographyshop.com/ "http://typographyshop.com") and thanks to Jeffrey Zeldman and Josh Spear, along with dozens of bloggers and design hubs we're off to a great start.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018224524im_/http:/typophile.com/files/men's_helvetica_t-shirtsm_5068.jpg)
author: TypographyShop

comments.content:
Nice.  
But why the Helvetica?  
I would love to have this in Universe.

Well, it's just one shirt for now. And why not start with a face born the year I was? We've got plenty of other faces and topics near and dear to typophiles' hearts in the works. Also, a few pithy sayings about life in the industry are coming soon.

Many thanks to the fine folks at Typophile, who brought a ton of new traffic last week.

[http://typographyshop.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018224524/http:/typographyshop.com/ "http://typographyshop.com")  
 [http://kinggroupmedia.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018224524/http:/kinggroupmedia.com/ "http://kinggroupmedia.com")
